page.title: 07A Day in my life 2
page.content: At 12:00 we get lunch ready. we lay the tables and put chairs around them.The dinner is put on our plates and we go away to eat it and when we are finished we clear it up and go outside to play. We come in at 1:00pm and work through to 2:15pm and have quarter of an hour break.After break we work to 3:30 then we go home. When I get home I watch T.V. or play on my computer or bike.At 5:30 I have tea.After tea if its a nice day I go out and play. I finish playing about 8:00 and then I watch T.V. Then I get ready for bed and say goodnight to mum and dad. I then go upstairs and jump into bed and sometimes I am allowed to read for a while.After reading I switch of my light and go to sleep.
